title: The Mandii B & Bridget Kelly Interview: Leaving Joe Budden's Network, Olivia Dope's Departure & More
description:
Mandii B is back on the program, with cohost Bridget Kelly, to talk about 'See The Thing Is..', departure from Joe Budden Network, the departure of the their 3rd cohost, the backlash, working with Charlamagne, mental health and much more!
https://www.instagram.com/fullcourtpu...
https://www.instagram.com/iambridgetk...
https://www.instagram.com/seethething...
